tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_91: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'By the sun and its brightness',verse: 5913,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: 'And [by] the moon when it follows it',verse: 5914,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'And [by] the day when it displays it',verse: 5915,},ayah_4: {image: '',text: 'And [by] the night when it covers it',verse: 5916,},ayah_5: {image: '',text: 'And [by] the sky and He who constructed it',verse: 5917,},ayah_6: {image: '',text: 'And [by] the earth and He who spread it',verse: 5918,},ayah_7: {image: '',text: 'And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it',verse: 5919,},ayah_8: {image: '',text: 'And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,',verse: 5920,},ayah_9: {image: '',text: 'He has succeeded who purifies it,',verse: 5921,},ayah_10: {image: '',text: 'And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].',verse: 5922,},ayah_11: {image: '',text: 'Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,',verse: 5923,},ayah_12: {image: '',text: 'When the most wretched of them was sent forth.',verse: 5924,},ayah_13: {image: '',text: 'And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."',verse: 5925,},ayah_14: {image: '',text: 'But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].',verse: 5926,},ayah_15: {image: '',text: 'And He does not fear the consequence thereof.',verse: 5927,},name: surah_91,};
